content: For those at the DevDays who are interested in searching and reading FHIR resources on a FHIR server and fetching them into R for statistical purposes, feel free to join the BoF session at Room Richard at 3 pm. Here we will briefly show R on FHIR and start a discussion about potential new features. Note: bring you temperature sensors to see it in action with 'real time' data. Also see https://github.com/furore-fhir/RonFHIR
